Select Distinct u.[UserID],
      u.[FirstName],
      u.[LastName],
	  u.[Email]
From tblUser u
JOIN PSProgramResources psp on psp.UserID = u.UserID
LEFT JOIN [PSTaskResource] pstr on pstr.ResourceID = u.UserID
LEFT JOIN [PSTask] pst on pst.ProgramID = psp.ProgramID
LEFT JOIN [PSProject] pspj on pspj.ProjectID = pst.ProjectID
where pspj.ProjectID in (36633,36748,36925,37230,37232,37233,37237,37238,36621,36632,36634,36636,36639,36640,36643,
36645,36648,36650,36654,36655,36658,36660,36662,36663,36664,36669,36672,36673,36677,36678,
36682,36694,36701,36703,36704,36705,36707,36710,36715,36719,36726,36727,36751,36760,36761,
36765,36768,36769,36770,36771,36784,36786,36824,36841,36842,36852,36869,36871,36938,36988,
36991,36995,36996,37000,37027,37030,37042,37044,37045,37046,37074,37082,37083,37086,37106,
37108,37109,37110,37111,37225,37321,37322,37323,37327,37328,37329,37330,37331,37348,37350,
37392,37396,37397,37401,37402,37406,37407,37409,37410,37414)
and pst.ProgramID  in (262, 279)
and u.Email != ''
order by [UserID]
--PSTask
